title: Energy Drink Advertisement
description: Energy Drink Advertisement Exercise, brand made in Adobe Illustrator 2023 and advertisement render done in Adobe Substance Stager. Compositing done in Adobe Photoshop 2024.

title: Missed Shot - Bittersweet Animated Motion Graphic
description: A young boy gets the opportunity to take a photo of his dreams, but unfortunately things don't seem to go according to his plan.

title: Coffee Chat - Podcast Animated Intro
description: Animated intro for fictional coffee podcast channel. Made assets with Adobe Fresco on Apple iPad Pro and animated in Adobe After Effects 2023.

title: Cabrera's Campers - 3D Environment Presentation
description: A cozy "golden hour" camping scene surrounded by a bohemian inspired fictional forest environment.

title: Disappointed Muppets - 3D Animated Short
description: A common occurrence to couples when isn't clarified who is making dinner. Animated in Autodesk Maya 2023 with paid character rigs done by Alorema Rigs.

title: Fantasy DND Book Model & Textured
description: Based on a reference picture from Jack Art Studios, a practice in texturing a stylized game prop with Arnold lighting and rendering for a video game or 3D film animation.

title: Acorn Dance - 2D Animated Short
description: Little forest sprite spirit finds pleasure in the smallest of victories. Created and animated in Procreate App on iPad Pro 2023.

title: Dwarven Axe - 3D Model & Textured
description: Based on a reference picture from Becca Hallstedt, a study in stylized weapons while experimenting with Adobe Substance Painter & Autodesk Maya. This project would be used for a video game asset.
